title: Between Stress And Poor Health, A Two-Way Street Tread By Many
teaser: NPR, the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation and the Harvard School of Public Health conducted a nationwide poll about the stress felt by Americans, where it comes from and what they do about it. Reporter Richard Knox cherry-picks some of the more interesting results for Robert Siegel.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
